short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for SPC Visual player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SPC Visual Digital Signage Chrome extension is built to support SPC Visual Digital Signage PWA (Progressive web App). The PWA App along with the Chrome extension - delivers the complete Digital Signage solution. This Chrome extension helps the PWA app to obtain the Device Unique ID. The PWA app can be installed from the following URL - https://signage.spcvisual.com/players/pwa
